From Acquisition
to Lifelong Customer
Create one time or programmatic customers to meet customers where they are and drive engagement.

Get Demo
ACQUISITION

Turn Leads Into Opted-in Prospects

Use pre-qualification direct mail to engage new leads via dynamic direct mail campaigns. Link with digital marketing efforts for a hyper-personalized omnichannel experience. 
  • Bring your data or use our Data Services 
  • Communicate pre-qualification or special promotions
  • Drive to opt-in with personalized URLs and QR codes

NURTURE

Hyperpersonalize Touchpoints

Trigger direct mail sends based on key actions by leads, focusing on delivering the right message at the right time via the right channel to drive engagement. 
  • Trigger automatic delivery based on key CRM workflows
  • Complement digital marketing campaigns with direct mail
  • Track delivery and trigger digital ads or sales follow up

RETARGETING

Get a Second Chance with Interested Leads

Turn to an underused channel to retarget leads. Whether they opted out of email communications or visited your site and bounce, use direct mail to grab their attention. 
  • Engage previous customers or cold prospects 
  • Trigger automated sends for personalized promotions
  • Get opt-ins from those who have opted out of email
RETENTION

Build Lifelong Customers

Create programmatic campaigns to connect with your customers at key milestones essential to building relationships, like key product milestones or birthdays. 
  • Trigger automatic delivery based on key CRM workflows
  • Augment relationships with personalized content
  • Incentivize engagement with promotions and offers
